title: Return/Refund Request
complaint_description: Customer wants to return item and request refund due to changed mind.
resolution_steps: Acknowledge message and apologize for inconvenience.
Request any required proof (photos, order number).
If out of return window, offer store credit and explain policy.
Confirm with customer when resolution completed and close the ticket.
agent_notes: Assigned to support agent #5097. Follow-up in 24-48 hours.
